commitmsg: Moved test suite to booster-tests.js
Refactored out a new SandboxFactory class.
Origination.
Consistently use {} instead of new Object().
Add tests for plain text console printing of objects with custom toString. Use Array.map for the arguments object and a wrapper around String, which already handles undefined/null values.
Fixed a bug in traceback, though I didn't add a regression test b/c I'm not entirely sure how to make one.
Changed observer-service to explicitly unregister all still-registered observers on unload.
Removed observe() and ignore() from preferences-service for now
Renamed some things in pref tests
Added another preferences unit test
Added preferences-service module w/ tests.
Added a test to observer-service that ensures that exceptions are logged.
Added unload test to observer-service tests.
Added an unload test to the timer module.
Moved sandboxed loader functionality from test-cuddlefish.js to run-suites.js; it's now attached as a convenience method to the test runner.
Added license blocks to all remaining SecurableModules.
Fixed a bug in unit-test.js that caused the stack to not unroll between tests.
Fixed a bug in the traceback module and wrote a regression test. Also, an observer-service observer that throws an exception now has it logged via console.exception().
Changed observer-service tests a bit.
Added observer-service.js, a SecurableModule version of Daniel Aquino and Myk Melez's Observers.js.
made 'memory' a global as per the JEP 28 spec, and added tests for it.
Updated to reflect latest docs.
Changed compaction interval of tracked objects to 5s, provided generic bin if a name can't be inferred.
Added initial implementation of memory module.
Exceptions raised in timer callbacks now log them used console.exception().
Implemented console.trace().
Even better outermost exception handling.
Better error feedback on outermost exception handler.
traceback.fromException() now supports Error instances.
traceback.fromException() now works w/ nsIException instances.
Added traceback.format() initial implementation.

Renamed dump-console.js to plain-text-console.js.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/lib/dump-console.js => chrome/content/lib/plain-text-console.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-console.js => chrome/content/tests/test-plain-text-console.js
Added a Loader.unload() method to the Cuddlefish Loader class.
Added a console.exception() method.
unit-test.startMany() now resets the stack every time a new test runs via timer.setTimeout().
Added timers module and unload module.
Minor refactoring to traceback.js
More url tests
Added exception for invalid URIs
Minor refactoring to url.js.
Added console tests and fixed bugs revealed by them.
added another url test
added url test
url module now deals w/ NS_ERROR_MALFORMED_URI, TestRunner now has assertRaises() function.
Added initial test-url.js

Refactored test runner more.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/tests/cuddlefish-tests.js => chrome/content/tests/run-suites.js
Changed tests a bit.
added a startMany() method to TestRunner.
TestRunner can now be used more than once.
Added test-console.js.
Renamed addException() to exception().
Renamed addPass() and addFail() to pass() and fail(), respectively.
Tests are run using unit-test module instead of dump-test-runner.
Initial barebones implementation of unit-test module.
Renamed booster.js to securable-module.js.

Renamed 'cuddle' to 'cuddlefish'

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/lib/cuddle.js => chrome/content/lib/cuddlefish.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/cuddle-tests.js => chrome/content/tests/cuddlefish-tests.js
Added README.

Added initial versions of traceback and URL module, and moved the test suite to be run within Cuddlefish itself.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/dump-test-runner.js => chrome/content/tests/dump-test-runner.js
Cuddlefish no longer requires booster.js to be manually loaded before it and passed into it.
Implemented console.debug().
Added more console tests.
Merged in changes from jep-25.
dump console now auto-enables browser.dom.window.dump.enabled preference if necessary.
Added to test
Added basic console.log().
Renamed 'lineno' to 'lineNo'
cuddle.js can now be loaded as a js module or script src.

Moved dump-test-runner.js out of lib.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/lib/dump-test-runner.js => chrome/content/dump-test-runner.js
Imported dump-test-runner.js from jep-25.

Added initial bootstrapping.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/booster.js => chrome/content/lib/booster.js

Origination of 'cuddlefish' project.

--HG--
rename : chrome/modules/booster.js => chrome/content/booster.js
Added more tests.
Made parentification more robust.
Added 'parentification' for filenames of sandboxed code that has the system principal and therefore needs to have wrappers made for it.
Added license blocks to files.
Added test names/messages to all assertEqual() calls.
Changes to output of assertEqual()
Refactoring to simplify code.
Loader() can now take an options.defaultPrincipal argument, as per JEP 25.
Added another test.
Loader() can now take a nsIURI or nsIFile for its options.rootPath parameter. Added a test to ensure that Loader() w/ no args when loaded in a document has the proper root dir.
loader.require(module) is now shorthand for loader.runScript('require(module)').
Added similar functionality to sandbox.evaluate().
Loader.runScript() can now pass a single string arg, which passes for Loader.runScript({contents: <string>}).
Added a few more tests and a TODO.

LocalFileSystem now uses URIs, channels, and streams internally instead of nsIFile objects. Also, its constructor now accepts nsIFile objects, nsIURI objects, and url strings. The Loader constructor also takes an optional rootPath parameter as specified in the current JEP 25.
Added README.
We now auto-retrieve compliance tests if they're not already present.
Added another test.
Added a bit more.
Test suite is now run twice: once in the context of a JS module, again in the context of a window.
Test output is more responsive.
Exit code of test suite now reflects its success.
Replaced run_tests shell script w/ python script.
Removed unneeded code.
Added another test.
Added another test.
Changed default principal to be a limited principal insteal of a system principal.
All compliance tests are now run and pass.
We now run the 'monkeys' compliance test, and it passes.
Aliased Cu == Components.utils
Refactored test microframework to be compatible w/ securablemodules interop tests.
simplfied Test interface
XPI export functionality works again.
Added support for running 'main' scripts.
Fixed a bug whereby the relative paths in local.json were being resolved based on the current directory, rather than the directory of local.json.
Fixed README to be consistent w/ current code.
Ignore weird OSErrors on destruction of xulrunner profiles.

Replaced run_tests.py with cuddlefisher.py, which automatically introspects the current directory's package.json and runs any tests it mentions.

--HG--
rename : bin/run_tests.py => bin/cuddlefisher.py
CUDDLEFISH_ROOT is now exported.
Added bin/activate, which bin/run_tests.py now assumes has been source'd.

Moved harness to python-packages/cuddlefish, and run_tests.py to bin/run_tests.py.

--HG--
rename : run_tests.py => bin/run_tests.py
rename : harness/__init__.py => python-packages/cuddlefish/__init__.py
rename : harness/application.ini => python-packages/cuddlefish/application.ini
rename : harness/components/harness.js => python-packages/cuddlefish/components/harness.js
rename : harness/defaults/preferences/prefs.js => python-packages/cuddlefish/defaults/preferences/prefs.js
rename : harness/install.rdf => python-packages/cuddlefish/install.rdf
rename : harness/profiler-scripts/profiler.js => python-packages/cuddlefish/profiler-scripts/profiler.js
rename : harness/securable-modules/harness.js => python-packages/cuddlefish/securable-modules/harness.js

Moved harness/python-modules to python-packages.

--HG--
rename : harness/python-modules/mozrunner/__init__.py => python-packages/mozrunner/__init__.py
rename : harness/python-modules/mozrunner/killableprocess.py => python-packages/mozrunner/killableprocess.py
rename : harness/python-modules/mozrunner/winprocess.py => python-packages/mozrunner/winprocess.py
rename : harness/python-modules/simplejson/__init__.py => python-packages/simplejson/__init__.py
rename : harness/python-modules/simplejson/decoder.py => python-packages/simplejson/decoder.py
rename : harness/python-modules/simplejson/encoder.py => python-packages/simplejson/encoder.py
rename : harness/python-modules/simplejson/scanner.py => python-packages/simplejson/scanner.py
rename : harness/python-modules/simplejson/tool.py => python-packages/simplejson/tool.py
Got rid of unused chrome.manifest files.
harness now just bootstraps on app-startup if a script is running rather than the test suite.
class/contractid of harness component is dynamically generated when exporting.
Changed interoperablejs test loader to use relative URL.
Added an --export command-line flag allowing cuddlefish programs to be exported as XULRunner/Firefox/Thunderbird extensions.
More refactorings.
A few refactorings to harness.
Minor function renaming.
contract ID and class ID of harness is passed in through options.
XPCOM typelibs in additional component directories are now automatically 'installed' into the harness for the duration of tests.
We now create a brand-new profile when running xulrunner tests.
harness now runs at final-ui-startup on XULRunner to ensure that the profile has been created and NSS won't die if accessed.
Minor change to factory unregistration code.
Added category manager capabilities to xpcom module.
Made harness work w/ memory profiler again
harness works w/ thunderbird again, though there are a bunch of weird spurious Cu.import() errors raised by thunderbird code.

Moved harness logic out of main.xul/main.js and to xpcom component.

--HG--
rename : harness/chrome/content/profiler.js => harness/profiler-scripts/profiler.js
rename : harness/chrome/content/harness.js => harness/securable-modules/harness.js
Added option for harness to run a main program via a --main command-line option, which allows for manual testing and experimentation.
Fixed a memory leak in timer.js and made it more efficient. We now report # of live objects being tracked in the testing sandbox.
Fixed a weird bug in memory.gc()

Added memory tracking instrumentation to a number of classes, memory leak report detection, made memory.js have no dependencies since it prevented memory tracking instrumentation on those dependencies.
Attempt to auto-set LD_LIBRARY_PATH when running harness under xulrunner in linux.
Removed the FirefoxBinaryFinder class from harness and replaced it w/ simple mozrunner reuse.
Simplified harness memory profiling code by exposing sandbox global scope info in securable-module.js.
Fixed an issue w/ memory profiling.
Per-module object count information is now reported.
Got rid of an annoying strict warning.
Added memory profiling code, if nsJetpack is available.

Renamed test-runner.js to harness.js to avoid confusing it w/ being a test suite (like test-file.js et al)

--HG--
rename : harness/chrome/content/test-runner.js => harness/chrome/content/harness.js
We now display memory usage stats (via nsIMemoryReporterManager) at the end of each test suite iteration.
Perform GC after each test suite iteration.
minor bugfix to last commit.
harness now puts its result in a file, which means we don't fail when running tests with debug builds of Firefox.
Changed maxversion to 1.9.3.*
Added file.read().
Made command line option docs consistent
It's now possible to specify how many times you want to run all tests, using a new '-x' command-line option. Hopefully it'll be useful in finding memory leaks.
Added the ability for harness to auto-register custom xpcom component directories.
Minor refactoring to unit-test.js, which should make it easier to detect memory leaks b/c onDone() will be called when a test's stack has unrolled.
Added a memory.gc() function that performs cycle collection.
Added license block, a few comments.
Factored out some of main.js into a harness-specific securablemodule, 'test-runner'.
We now emit a stace trace whenever a test fails.
Made unloader test a bit more robust.
Renamed a test to be more accurate.
Added another test.
Added license block.
Added another xpcom test, fixed a bug revealed by it.
Replaced Cu.import(XPCOMUtils.jsm) with require('xpcom')
Added an xpcom securable-module that allows a factory to register and unregister itself.
url.toFilename() can now convert chrome: URLs that aren't in jars.
Minor cosmetic changes.
Harness works on thunderbird now, but no longer on XULRunner... argh.
Test harness works better w/ firefox.
Removed toolkit.defaultChromeURI pref and replaced it with an app-startup XPCOM service that opens a window.
Added an --app option to the harness package, which allows tests to be run in xulrunner, firefox, or thunderbird.
Added url.fromFilename().
Simplified xhr caching logic and likely removed a memory leak.
Added license block.
Added xhr module.
Changed cuddlefish.loader to cuddlefish.parentLoader as per conversation with Jono.

Moved harness/python-modules/harness.py to harness/__init__.py and simplified run_tests.py.

--HG--
rename : harness/python-modules/harness.py => harness/__init__.py
downloading of interop suite now only occurs if the user actually runs tests when calling run_tests.py (as opposed to looking at cmdline opts, etc.)
removed run-suites.js. main.js now loads unit-test and calls its findAndRunTests() function on its own.
Folded the securable-module tests from the jep-25 repository into this one.
Moved test-finding functionality into unit-test module.
Made members of securable-module classes public, added a require('cuddlefish').loader attr to the module which is the Loader of the *current* cuddlefish instance.
test harness now passes a custom console into its loader in which tests are run.
Added __url__ global to cuddlefish modules and scripts.
Added assertMatches() to testing repertoire, made file.list() raise a friendlier error when the path doesn't exist.
Minor change to test output.
Supressing pointless console messages like 'Invalid chrome URI: /'.
Added a -v/--verbose option to run_tests.py.

run_tests.py now imports all its modules from harness/python-modules, main.js now gets all its cuddlefish-specific information via JSON from run_tests.py, and the 'harness' directory can now potentially be reused by other projects.
Changed preferences-service.set() to throw if a float is passed as the value, rather than truncate the float and log a warning.
Test suite output is now much less verbose by default, making it easier to spot failing tests.
Added file.join() and changed run-suites.js to use the file module to dynamically find suites.
Added file.dirname()
Added 'assertNotEqual()' to test suite functions, url.toFilename(), and started moving over Irakli's file module from narwhal.  Only file.list() is currently supported.
Minor refactorings
harness no longer uses current working dir, since a race condition can sometimes make it have a weird value.
Fixed .hgignore.

Moved xulrunner harness app into 'harness' dir

--HG--
rename : application.ini => harness/application.ini
rename : chrome/chrome.manifest => harness/chrome/chrome.manifest
rename : chrome/content/main.js => harness/chrome/content/main.js
rename : chrome/content/main.xul => harness/chrome/content/main.xul
rename : defaults/preferences/prefs.js => harness/defaults/preferences/prefs.js

Moved 'lib' and 'tests' dir from chrome/content to root dir.

--HG--
rename : chrome/content/lib/cuddlefish.js => lib/cuddlefish.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/memory.js => lib/memory.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/observer-service.js => lib/observer-service.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/plain-text-console.js => lib/plain-text-console.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/preferences-service.js => lib/preferences-service.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/securable-module.js => lib/securable-module.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/timer.js => lib/timer.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/traceback.js => lib/traceback.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/unit-test.js => lib/unit-test.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/unload.js => lib/unload.js
rename : chrome/content/lib/url.js => lib/url.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/run-suites.js => tests/run-suites.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-cuddlefish.js => tests/test-cuddlefish.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-memory.js => tests/test-memory.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-observer-service.js => tests/test-observer-service.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-plain-text-console.js => tests/test-plain-text-console.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-preferences-service.js => tests/test-preferences-service.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-timer.js => tests/test-timer.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-traceback.js => tests/test-traceback.js
rename : chrome/content/tests/test-url.js => tests/test-url.js
Removed outdated comment.
Fixed a race condition bug in run_tests.py.
run_tests.py now supports xulrunner-bin via the -b argument.
Minor formatting change
Enabled strict mode on testing suite and fixed a warning raised by it. Also, nsIConsole messages now show up in test output.

Report useful error if Cu.import() of securable-module.js fails.

--HG--
extra : rebase_source : 64f793bc350bf7506ac2c23ba57583047ebd07e6
fixed README, 'cfx test' -> 'cfx testall'
copied latest mozrunner from mikeal's github repo at http://github.com/mikeal/mozrunner/
added another test
added a python implementation of nsIVersionComparator.
do not check hidden dirs (dirs that start with '.')
Show module list for each package in CFX documentation
Added really basic documentation web server.  Right now all it does is show what packages are installed and their descriptions.
prefer to show 'fullName' from package.json as xpi name
removed 'testall' from being listed in packages to test when running 'cfx testall'
moved jetpack.py to the atul-packages repo and made jpx a more generic call into it.
minor rewording of cmdline help
Added a --config option to cfx, which allows users to specify command-line options from a configuration specified in a local.json file in the user's cfx root.
testall command now pays attention to test-related cmdline options
Added 'testall' and 'update' commands to cfx.
Replaced the dynamic svn checkout of interoperablejs-read-only with just putting the compliance tests in the cuddlefish package.  This reduces the number of dependencies needed to run tests.
'jpx test' now works.
Added jpx.bat for windows users.
added optional extraOutput param to securableModule.Loader.runScript.
enable support for 'xpi' target in jpx
jpx now obeys the --runner option.
jpx now 'inherits' some command-line options from cfx.
added initial version of 'jpx', like cfx but for jetpacks. ideally this should go in atul-packages, but there's no easy way to allow other packages to add command-line tools.
moved a function to a different place for readability
cfx options are now divided into groups.
simplified cfx usage string implementation
factored out argument parsing into cuddlefish.parse_args().
support passing-in a pkg_cfg to cuddlefish.run() and added cuddlefish.packaging.find_packages_with_module().
minor refactoring
refactored packaging.py to support absolute paths for dir names in package.json sections.
added a comment
cfx always tries to run tests instead of bailing if it doesn't see any in package.json.
Removed the 'paths' property from the return value of packaging.build_config(), as it was unused.
resolved two packaging system TODOs, refactored the way packaging.build_config() works.
refactored the packaging module to use Bunch instead of dict.
factored out a packaging.resolve_dir() function
added a --dep-tests option to cfx, which tells it to run tests for all dependencies of the current package too.
Minor modification to securable-module.js to allow for membranes to work.
Various fixes to traceback module, to help it deal w/ thrown exceptions that aren't Error instances.
added --no-quit option to cfx, which allows windows users to look at the console output when tests are done.
assertRaises() now works if the thrown exception is a string.
Added assert() function to unit-test.js.
Added tag jep-31-examples for changeset 39c45211aa25
minor refactoring
Added another TODO.
Added a TODO.
Renamed contract id of harness service.
packages may now contain subpackages.
Finished implementation of packaging.getURLForData().
Half-implemented implementation of supporting package data resources.
Added mapping from resource hosts to package names in harness JSON options.
Simplified some logic in runner.py.
It's now possible to build an xpi of a library that has no main program, so that the template can contain the main program.
Changed unit-test.TestFinder() such that it assumes all exported functions from a test-* module are tests, rather than filtering out symbols that don't start with 'test'.
Added 'url' and 'license' as possible metadata properties.
lib, tests, dependencies in package.json now can be strings or arrays of strings.
cfx now infers default dirs for lib and test, and also infers a default value for the package name.
Added mozrunner command-line interface to bin directory.
Fixed cfx.bat to reflect previous commit.
Changed README to reflect last commit.

Renamed cuddlefisher to cfx, since it's quicker to type.

--HG--
rename : bin/cuddlefisher.py => bin/cfx
rename : bin/cuddlefisher.bat => bin/cfx.bat
Added a command-line option to cuddlefish.runner to make life better on Windows.
downloading of interopjs now fails more gracefully.
Added batch files to bin directory for Windows support.
Made cuddlefish.run() take optional 'arguments' arg
Made package metadata available to XPIs via packaging.options.metadata.

Merged packaging-tests into test-harness.

--HG--
rename : packages/packaging-tests/tests/test-packaging.js => packages/test-harness/tests/test-packaging.js
Added a 'packaging' global to modules loaded in extensions via harness.js, which provides access to packaging metadata, etc.
harness service can now have its wrappedJSObject and loader retrieved by XPCOM clients.
The harness service's contract ID is now named based on the id of the extension being built, rather than the random guid of the harness component.
Building an xpi now copies the contents of the whole extension template into the .xpi file.
Added a --templatedir option, which allows cuddlefisher to use a different app-extension directory than the default.
harness.js is now completely decoupled from cuddlefish proper.
Updated README.txt instructions

Restructured directories such that cuddlefish is now in its own package in the 'packages' directory.

Slightly better chance of gc'ing better on one iteration of suite.
Fixed test runner to work on thunderbird.
Global variable is now cleared in run-tests.js

Moved test running code out of the generic app-extension and into a new 'test-harness' package.

--HG--
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/app-extension/securable-modules/harness.js => packages/test-harness/lib/harness.js
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/app-extension/profiler-scripts/profiler.js => packages/test-harness/lib/profiler-scripts/profiler.js

Moved harness xulrunner app/extension files into an app-extension dir.

--HG--
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/application.ini => python-packages/cuddlefish/app-extension/application.ini
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/components/harness.js => python-packages/cuddlefish/app-extension/components/harness.js

Simplified plugin interface.
Removed duplicate code.
Factored out app-running functionality into cuddlefish.runner.
Better feedback on package.json malformedness.

Renamed cuddlefish.xpcomutils to cuddlefish.xpcom, and cuddlefish.rdfutils to cuddlefish.rdf.

--HG--
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/rdfutils.py => python-packages/cuddlefish/rdf.py
rename : python-packages/cuddlefish/xpcomutils.py => python-packages/cuddlefish/xpcom.py
Factored-out all packaging-related code to cuddlefish.packaging.
Removed unneeded code.
Removed unneeded code.
Various refactorings to cuddlefisher.
Removed extraneous import.
made resource dir prefixes easier to read when testing.
Added an xpcom.autoRegister() function. Can't really write a test for it without adding xpcom binary components to cuddlefish, though.
xpts are now included in XPIs and when tests/main runs.
Added incompatibility error when --components is used with the 'xpi' command on cuddlefisher.
Added support for build xpcom components.
Display help on unknown command.
Refactorings to cuddlefisher.
Removed temporary code from my last commit, and made xpcom component generation clear src/build directories on completion.
Added cuddlefish.bunch and cuddlefish.xpcomutils, ported code from jetpack's manage.py useful for building xpcom components.
Ignore the 'packages' directory instead of the local.json file.
We now just look at dirs in a 'packages' dir, if it exists, to find packages, instead of using local.json.
Added sidenotes, reworded a few things.
Abandoned the doctype, now just using a quirks mode fix from MDC to enable standard table style CSS inheritance.
Added code to manually adjust page height to ensure the footer is at the bottom of the window. Ugh. Left a TODO to fix it later.
Added globals.md appendix, and a doctype to index.html so tables inherit css nicely. Unfortunately, though, this makes the main area not be 100% tall, which I'll fix next.
Added a sidenote pointing to Firebug.
Added sidenote to CommonJS module spec.
Added some sidenotes to documentation.
Separated out developer guide into tutorial and appendix sections.
Added caveat to programs tutorial.
Added more to program tutorial.
Added 'programs' section. Also made cfx add jetpack-core as a dependency if no other dependencies with loaders are specified.
Added package spec docs.
added section on adding docs
Added more to packaging.md tutorial.
Ok, fine, aligning baselines a bit. OCD.
Removed p:first-child margin-top:0 stuff. Will deal w/ perfecting typography later.
Links pointing to pages within the documentation, e.g. #guide/packaging, now have their target automatically set to _self.
Finished up 'getting started' section, started 'packaging' section
Added padding to pre sections, changed padding of bulleted lists, fixed bug w/ display of monospace.
Changed verbage of README: 'Jetpack' -> 'Jetpack SDK'
Changed verbage of docs: 'Jetpack' -> 'Jetpack SDK'
Added installation section to getting started page, as well as troubleshooting information for the sanity check.
Fault tolerance for mod_wsgi.
Made server.py work (but without httpd support) if wsgiref is unavailable, i.e. if the user is using Python 2.4.
Fixed a bug in the way non-breaking hyphens are used in docs.
Added 'Jetpack SDK' to glossary.
Added sidenotes to documentation.
Refactorings to formatting of getting-started.md.
Added another TODO.
Added basic view-source feature for markdown documentation.
Hardened server a bit, added a 'safe mode' allowing it to run on a remote server to just serve documentation.
Lighter footer.

Moved index.html to root of static-files so its relative paths make sense and it can eventually be loaded statically.

--HG--
rename : static-files/html/index.html => static-files/index.html
Made all doc server code paths relative instead of absolute, so it can be mounted anywhere.
left column is now the same color all the way down to the bottom of the page.
Refactored clickable buttons in documentation; buttons and links now highlight yellow on hover.
Autolink bugzilla mentions in markdown text to their actual bug pages.
Added glossary.
Narrower ToC sidebar, wider content area. Added basic getting started docs.
Fixed another CSS bug.
Added a welcome/help message displayed when 'bin/activate' is run.
Fixed a CSS bug.
Removed directory/file-listing code.
Added developer guide UI.
Disabling display of file lists.
Added apiparser.py, a file Aza wrote, to cuddlefish python package.
Added an error display at the top of the docs if they can't talk to the doc server.
Changed CFX -> Jetpack.

Renamed this project to jetpack, and the 'cuddlefish' package to jetpack-core. The 'cuddlefish' JS module still exists, though we may eventually rename it to jetpack-loader or somesuch.

Factored out bootstrapping code of task-runner into a separate module.
Bug #541622 - Implement byte streams
Added per-module documentation to web app. Only cuddlefish's 'file' module is documented right now.
Added a 'cfx docs' option which opens the documentation in a web browser. The doc server is automatically shut down when the documentation page is closed.
Minor refactoring.
Increased idle timeout from 5 seconds to 60 seconds.
Documentation fades in now once it's all ready to be presented, rather than abruptly bringing parts of itself in as they become available.
Added display of README.md in package dirs to documentation app, as well as 'slowdown', a markdown implementation for JS. The doc app also supports hash params now.
Added double quotes around package name in docs
Refactored documentation app, made a really simple package detail view.
Modified main.js to work on safari.
Quiet server no longer displays broken pipe error messages.
quick-start now opens the CFX documentation page in a web browser iff it's not already open.
fixed a minor formatting style mistake.
quick-start can now be run without having to call activate first.
Added initial version of 'quick-start' program, which starts up the documentation/task server in one thread and launches the task-runner program in another thread.
Reverted changeset dbd30e499ce4
Added initial gunky version of task-runner program
Changed maxVersion to 3.7.*.
Minor refactorings

Altered naming of update.rdf file.

resolved a TODO in harness.js: resource URI mappings are now undone when an extension/jetpack is unloaded.

Fixed a bug preventing cuddlefish modules from being dynamically loaded and unloaded during firefox runtime.

'cfx run' no longer times out after 5 minutes, but 'cfx test' still does.

optparse.OptionConflictError in python-lib/cuddlefish/__init__.py breaks jpx, as mentioned at http://groups.google.com/group/mozilla-labs-jetpack/msg/e327a036385050d4
Added some fail-safe code.
Changed the way the window is closed in run-tests.js.
Fixed a TODO in run-tests.js.
Refactorings to XPCOM harness service and run-tests.js.
Removed --components option from cfx, since it's no longer used.
Added a TODO to test runner code.
Some refactorings and feature additions to make it possible for the harness XPCOM service to be loaded/unloaded multiple times at runtime.
nsIFactory objects provided by xpcom.js now expose a wrappedJSObject, which allows e.g. their unregister() method to be called.
made 'cfx serve' also serve as a task queue server. cfx commands can then be sent to the task queue server rather than used to launch mozilla apps directly with the --use-server option.
made 'cfx serve' server threaded.
Refactored harness.js XPCOM component to prepare for bootstrap.js modifications to extension manager.

better memory profiling

better memory usage reporting

Added documentation for storage.

Added some new featuers to the parser: code blocks now are appropriatly formated for DekiWiki. Also, fixed a problem where you had to be at the root of the jep-28 repo for the docs command to work. Finally, fixed some bugs with the upload location.

Added our documentation system. This documentation system
works by having our docs in a extend markdown format,
which then get rendered into HTML, and finally uploaded to MDC.

Use it by:
* Activating the environment: source bin/activate
* Using "docs --help"

This is a first iteration, so it still is lacking some features
like:
* Documenting return types well
* Dealing with merges resulting in the wiki being updated manually
Add Emacs autosaves (*~) to .hgignore
replace 'cfx update' with more flexible 'hgall' command
added an --extra-packages cmdline option to cfx.
test harness now just uses require('nsjetpack') instead of manually trying to use Cc/Ci.
